a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Depressive disorders prevalence, males vs. females, 2021
Estimated share of people who had depressive disorders, whether or not they were diagnosed, based on
representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling.

g.text: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

text.tspan: Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
